GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.10.153
GSD.description:
tipc: fix a null-ptr-deref in tipc_topsrv_accept

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.153 by commit 32a3d4660b34ce49ac0162338ebe362098e2f5df, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 0ef897be12b8b4cf297b6016e79ec97ec90f2cf6. For more details please see the references link.
